job_tasks.phrase: build and maintain ETL pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of creating and managing data pipelines, which are essential for data integration and processing.

job_tasks.phrase: create foundational data models in our data warehouse
job_tasks.justification: Building data models within a data warehouse is a fundamental software engineering task related to data architecture and management.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate new data sources using DataOps best practices, including documentation and testing
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating external data into existing systems, adhering to software development best practices like DataOps, documentation, and testing.

job_tasks.phrase: support other data specialists in their work to make their queries and tables efficient and their use of data effective
job_tasks.justification: This describes a software engineering support role, focusing on optimizing data infrastructure and usage for other technical specialists.

job_tasks.phrase: build and maintain data models, libraries and the tooling supporting data processing
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the core software engineering responsibility of building and maintaining data infrastructure and tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage raw data in our data warehouse to build a curated data models
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct task of data modeling, a key component of software engineering for data management.

job_tasks.phrase: Write production quality ELT code (Python, SQL) with an eye towards performance and maintainability
job_tasks.justification: Writing production-quality code in specific languages (Python, SQL) with a focus on performance and maintainability is a core software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and maintain architecture and systems documentation
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of systems and architecture is a standard software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain our data catalog as a scalable resource to support self-service and serve as single source of truth for data definition
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data catalog involves software system maintenance and ensuring data governance, aligning with software engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training to help deliver optimal, DRY, and scalable database designs and queries
job_tasks.justification: This involves technical guidance and best practices in data modeling and query optimization, which falls under software engineering collaboration and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve, manage, and teach code maintainability and performance standards in code submitted and reviewed
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on code quality, maintainability, and performance standards, and teaching these to others, is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Help our team maintain and improve the infrastructure for data collection, processing, management and analysis
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving data infrastructure is a software engineering task, akin to managing backend systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, design, implement and drive new solutions and software for solving complex data processing problems across all of DeepL
job_tasks.justification: This describes the full software development lifecycle from research and design to implementation and deployment of solutions for data processing.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on our internal tools to make the data easily accessible to our internal stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Developing internal tools to facilitate data access is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members to collect business requirements, define successful outcomes, and design data models
job_tasks.justification: Collecting business requirements and aligning data models with business outcomes is a key aspect of understanding business strategy and translating it into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Become a domain expert in the data you are work with
job_tasks.justification: Developing domain expertise is crucial for understanding business context and applying technical skills effectively to solve business problems.

job_tasks.phrase: support other data specialists in their work
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a collaborative effort to assist colleagues with their technical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: work in a cross-functional team with product managers, data scientists, data engineers and developers to solve complex technical challenges
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states collaboration within a cross-functional team to address technical challenges.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members to collect business requirements, define successful outcomes, and design data models
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with team members for requirement gathering and design.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training
job_tasks.justification: This describes sharing expertise and knowledge with team members through various collaborative methods.

job_tasks.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
job_tasks.justification: This section directly emphasizes open communication, feedback, and collaboration as core values.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on tasks related to building and maintaining data pipelines, data models, and internal tools using Python and SQL. There is no mention of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or any generative AI specific tasks. The role is firmly rooted in traditional data engineering and software development practices, aligning with the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, which are all related to data engineering and software development. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML tasks that would suggest a different profile. The technologies mentioned (Python, SQL) are standard for this type of role.
